law.catch_line: Allocation of funds to incorporated areas.
law.text: Ten percent (10%) of the funds allocated to each county under the provisions of KRS 42.470 shall be allotted to the incorporated areas within the county based on the ratio that the population of each incorporated area bears to the total population of all the incorporated areas within the county; except that incorporated areas shall not be eligible for funds allocated to counties under the provisions of KRS 42.490 and 1980 Acts, ch. 394, sec. 11.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1980.
